short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Extension will pull the record you are looking at into Collectival for certain sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension gives you the power of Collectival's one click collecting technology. With it, you can bring items from certain auction and e-commerce sites directly into your Collectival account. Email hello@collectival.com for more information.

We currently support one-click collecting from the following auction and e-commerce sites:

- Christie's
- eBay (sold listings only)
- Invaluable (auction items only)
- Sotheby's
